Class PlayerModel

extends EntityModel

      • PlayerModel

                   float y,
                   float rotation,
                   int id)
        Creates a new Player model in a certain position and having a certain rotation and id.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate in meters
        y - the y-coordinate in meters
        rotation - the rotation in radians
        id - the Id of the player
